place: Berlitz School of Languages, Via S Nicolo 32, Trieste, Austria
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Stannie Located here. Write at once by letter c/o above address. Send B A and birth and medical certificates—also no of Irish Homestead containing my ‘After the Race’. Am writing another ‘Xmas Eve’. Have finished Chap. XII. Write fully. If you have sent money, say—I shall have it transferred. Arrived this morning. Will write when have leisure. Letter only as am not sure of my address here yet. Jim
